sentences.en: a blank cassette
sentences.cn: 一盒空白磁带

sentences.en: Abbot looked blank. "I don't quite follow, sir."
sentences.cn: 阿博特一脸茫然。“我没听明白，先生。”

sentences.en: He fired point-blank at Bernadette.
sentences.cn: 他近距离朝贝尔纳黛特开了枪。

sentences.en: He had a still, almost blank face in repose.
sentences.cn: 他休息时面部平静，几乎毫无表情。

sentences.en: He had murdered Perceval at point blank range with a single shot.
sentences.cn: 他在近距离一枪射杀了珀西瓦尔。

sentences.en: His expressions varied from poker-faced to blank.
sentences.cn: 他的表情在一本正经和茫然惶惑之间变幻不定。

sentences.en: I learned to blank those feelings out.
sentences.cn: 我学着刻意忘记那些感觉。

sentences.en: I was trying to blank out previous situations from my mind.
sentences.cn: 我试图将先前的境遇从大脑中抹去。

sentences.en: I'm sorry, but my mind is a blank.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我脑子里一片空白。

sentences.en: It's not my blankety-blank fault!
sentences.cn: 这他妈不是我的错！

sentences.en: Leave the last page blank .
sentences.cn: 最后一页留空。

sentences.en: Leave the last page blank.
sentences.cn: 最后一页留空。

sentences.en: My mind went totally blank.
sentences.cn: 我的脑子突然一片空白。

sentences.en: Sign your name in the blank space below.
sentences.cn: 把名字签在下面的空白处。

sentences.en: The President was given a blank check by Congress to continue the war.
sentences.cn: 国会授予总统全权可继续这场战争。

sentences.en: the search drew a blank.
sentences.cn: 搜寻失败了。

sentences.en: They drew a blank in their search for the driver.
sentences.cn: 他们四处寻找那个司机，但一无所获。

sentences.en: When they found us guilty, I just went blank.
sentences.cn: 当他们判定我们有罪时，我的脑子顿时一片空白。

sentences.en: When you’ve filled in the blanks , hand the form back to me.
sentences.cn: 你填好表格以后把它交还给我。

sentences.en: Write your letter and seal it in a blank envelope.
sentences.cn: 信写好后把它装进空白信封里封好。

words.tran_cn: 茫然地；毫无表情地；茫然若失
[电讯][印刷][计]空白；空虚；空白表格

phrases.tran_cn: 空白支票；空头支票；自由处理权
素体诗，无韵诗（不押韵的五音步诗行）
毫无进展的状态；无法克服的障碍
得不到想得到的回应（或信息）；失败
预留的空白位置；在空格里，在空白处
近距离平射的，直截了当的

trans.tran_cn: 空（白）的，没表情的，不感兴趣的，彻底的
trans.tran_en: without any writing, print, or recorded sound

trans.tran_cn: 空格，空白处，头脑空白，空包弹
trans.tran_en: an empty space on a piece of paper, where you are supposed to write a word or letter
